document_data.name: '''Accuracy'''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Accuracy''''' was an offensive type of [[giant]] rune.
document_data.Effects: When affected by this rune, missile [[weapon]]s had a higher chance of reaching their target. If this rune was extensively studied a second time, then this effect would be even greater.
document_data.Components: Like most giant runes, it required no [[material component]]s to cast. The process of shaping this rune generally took around ten to forty minutes and it needed to be inscribed upon a missile, such as an ''arrow'' or ''[[javelin]]''.
